name: Epic Santa Parkour
description:
A platformer with Santa created for the Winter Break Game Jam 2020 of ACM Studio UCLA. The goal is to collect presents and get to the chimney.

Controls:

Move Horizontally - WASD

Jump - Space

Ledge Drop - S

Ledge Climb - W

Wall Jump - Space

Turn Camera - Move Mouse

Creators:

Aaron Isara

Alexander Ma

Christian Loanzon

Peter Sutarjo
